//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//
// [DoD] TMS - Addon Anti-VoiceCommandSpam
//
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////	
"Phrases"
{
	"NoVoiceSpam"
	{
		"en"	"Sorry, VoiceCommand-Spamming is NOT allowed!"
	}
	
	"TryAgainIn"
	{
		"en"	"Sorry, you recently used a VoiceCmd! Try again in %i seconds"
	}
}
